metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)how the Chalimbana University managed to raise funds used for the construction of thirteen staff houses; and
(b)what the cost of construction, on average, of each house was.
(a)whether the Government has any plans to construct army barracks in Kaputa District; and
(b)if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Health when the Government will
parts: (a)expedite the construction of the student accommodation and school kitchen at St. Pauls’ School of Nursing and Midwifery in Nchelenge which were destroyed by fire;
(b)address the poor electricity supply;
(c)procure a school bus particularly for transportation of students  for practical lessons;
(d)provide adequate monthly grants; and

(e)provide more teaching and other staff, who as of December, 2012,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       were only at 45 per cent of the establishment.

questions.minister: Minister of Information and Broadcasting when the Zambia News and Information Services office in Sesheke District will be provided with the following
parts: (a)adequate equipment;
(b)a motor vehicle; and
(c)additional staff. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W50    Mr S Chungu (Luanshya) - to ask the Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development:
(a)how many small scale mining companies were operational in Luapula Province as of 2012;
(b)what minerals were being mined;
(c)in which areas of the Province the mining companies were located; and
(d)who the owners of the companies were. W51    Mr S Chungu (Luanshya) - to ask the Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development:
(a)which mining companies were involved in nickel production in Zambia as of 2012;
(b)where the mines were located;
(c)how many tonnes of nickel were produced in 2011 and 2012; and
(d)how much money was realised from the sale of the nickel, company by company. W52    Mr Ng’onga (Kaputa) - to ask the Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication:
(a)how much money the road Transport and Safety Agency raised from 2009 to 2012, year by year, under the following:
(i)registration of motor vehicles; (ii)issuance of road licences; (iii)examination for motor vehicle fitness; and (iv)toll fees from heavy duty foreign trucks;
(b)which sources of funding supported the procurement of works from 2010 to 2012; and
(c)which source contributed the largest amount of money during the same period.
